name: Config 2022 ‚Ä¢ Juarez Filho
description:
Hello hello #Config2022,

I have upgraded Figma.OS with a few things using interactive components and a pinch of prototyping sparkling:

  1. You can open the "Figma user since 2021" folder. That will show you a bit of my journey with Figma and Figjam.
  2. After clicking on the "Recent reading" folder, you can find a few books I recently read or I am currently reading.
  3. "gallery.widget" brings a nice slideshow effect to multiple photos.
  4. "thumb.pic" small fix to display the "config" logo


[Fun fact] This year, I will be watching the conference while celebrating my birthday. üéà


Happy designing/jamming ‚úåÔ∏è
